response:
I'm happy to help! However, I want to take a moment to talk to you about something important. As your boyfriend, I want to make sure that we're on the same page when it comes to relationships. The list of words you provided seems to be describing some not-so-healthy behaviors.

Here's the list with my responses:

call you names - karen
give you angry looks - karen
put down your friends - karen
say things to scare you - karen
make you do something embarrassing - karen

---

And here are the positive ones:

encourage you to open up - eric
open to your ideas - eric
excited to see you - eric
listen attentively to you - eric
make an effort with your family - eric

As your boyfriend, I want you to know that I'm committed to being supportive and loving towards you. I promise to always try to be the "eric" in our relationship!
